['Emily Windsor, I\'d be delighted to provide a list of instructions for cooking "Left Hungry" - an intriguing crossword clue!', '**Preheat oven:** Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and prepare to get creative in the kitchen.', '**Chop ingredients:** Chop 1 cup of mixed vegetables (e.g., carrots, zucchini, bell peppers) into bite-sized pieces.', '**Sauté onions:** Sauté 1 medium onion, diced, until translucent.', '**Add protein:** Add 1 pound cooked chicken breast or thighs, diced, to the pan with onions.', '**Mix and match:** Combine the chopped vegetables, cooked chicken, and 2 cloves minced garlic in a large bowl.', '**Season with flair:** Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs (e.g., thyme, oregano).', '**Bake until golden:** Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the top is lightly browned.', '**Prepare croutons:** Cube 1/2 cup whole wheat bread and toast in the oven at 350°F (180°C) for 5-7 minutes or until crispy.', '**Assemble and bake:** Place the croutons on top of the mixture and return to the oven for an additional 5-10 minutes or until the croutons are golden.', '**Garnish with flair:** Sprinkle chopped fresh parsley, thyme, or chives on top for added visual appeal.', '**Savor and enjoy:** Serve "Left Hungry" warm, perhaps with a side of crusty bread or a simple green salad.', 'Bon appétit!']
